#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{ char a[109][29],ss[29];
int i,ans=0,k,j,n;
char b[109];
cin>>n;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{ cin>>a[i];
 cin>>b[i];
}
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{k=0;
	
	if(b[i]!='0')
	{

strcpy(ss,a[i]);

for(j=i;j<n;j++)
{
	if((strcmp(ss,a[j])==0))
{  if(k!=0)
   if(k>0)
   k--;
   else
   k++;
	
	if(b[j]=='+')
	k+=1;
	else
	k+=-1;
b[j]='0';}

}

ans+=k;
}

}
cout<<ans<<"\n";
}
	return 0;
}
